title: In-room Amenities
des: One Bed per Student shall be offered,Fully furnished rooms with beds & under bed drawers,Study tables & Chair,Tube lights & LED, Fan,Dustbin in each room,300 square feet spacious room.

title: Self Help Amenities
des: Laundry Service,Filter Water facility to be provided,Medical facility available with first aid/ provided to sick Residents,Doctor on call number(s) to be shared with the students,Dining area.

title: Cost-Effective Living Option
des: Cost-effective compared to other living options,Get all services together in the single hall cost,Long corridor infront of room,Separate balcony in each room.

title: Electricity & Internet
des: Electricity facility,24/7 Generator facility,High speed internet for each students

title: Housekeeping
des: Rooms,Washrooms,Common areas are cleaned on a daily basis,Regular pest controlled services

title: Entertainment
des: Mini lounge area with sitting arrangement,Common TV,Indoor games like carrom , chess, table tennis etc.
